colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (CES PA 'DI NI KHAL KHA DZA SAG THU RGYAL PO MA nI BADZRA NAS RIN CHEN GNYIS PA'I MAndAL BCAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, DAM PA'I MTSAN GYIS BYIN GYIS RLABS PA SH'AKYA'I DGE TSUL BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS 'JIGS MED BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS RANG SNANG GANG 'DOD DU SBYAR BA'O, ,YI GE PA NI KHU BO CHOS RJE MKHAN PO YE SHES DGE LEGS SO, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS 'JIGS MED BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN,
